infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan receipts and documents for transaction entry.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app accesses your contacts to help you split bills and share expenses with friends.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location to help categorize transactions based on nearby merchants.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app needs access to your calendar to schedule bill payment reminders.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app needs access to your reminders to create bill payment reminders.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationUsageDescription: This app uses notifications to keep you informed.
infoPlist.NSPushNotificationsUsageDescription: This app uses push notifications to keep you informed.
